Name: wrapAll
Desc: Wraps all nodes together in a single wrapper element.
Long Desc: Wraps all matched elements as a single group within an HTML structure. This method is useful for inserting a new parent structure around a set of elements without disrupting their existing document position. Unlike 'wrap', which wraps each element individually, 'wrapAll' places all elements within a single container, making it ideal for grouping related elements together for styling or JavaScript manipulation.
